pages.title: Enderwire modem
pages.text: Enderwire modem, that need to be attached to computer directly, allows to access peripherals inside enderwire network! Can send redstone signals from 4 sides.$(p)$(o)Not configurable, and don't have any data in state$()

pages.title: Peripheral sharing
pages.text: Block, that allow to populate connected peripheral to enderwire network.$(p)$(o)Not configurable, have data about shared peripheral inside state$()
